message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more than that to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value you place on the product, I am still unable to go beyond $12,000. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.
